scryfall.name: Scryfall API
scryfall.description: An API for Magic: The Gathering card data.
scryfall.example_use: Search for white cards with a mana value of 1

exchange_rates.name: ExchangeRate-API
exchange_rates.description: A simple and reliable API for current and historical foreign exchange rates.
exchange_rates.example_use: Get the latest exchange rates for USD

JustTCG.name: JustTCG API
JustTCG.description: An API for trading card game data, including Magic: The Gathering.
JustTCG.example_use: Get a list of Magic: The Gathering cards
